entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContainerHttpException contains request instead of response #34979

Closed

  • DOTNET_GENERATE_ASPNET_CERTIFICATE environment variable ignored in dotnet CLI first-time use flow #34779
  • Package validation fail in .NET 8 with Unnecessary suppressions found #34936
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Added JavaScript import after #34983
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Change containers publish target to require IsPublishable (and explicit SDK Container support) #34980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs config knobs #34968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.2 in /eng/dependabot #34967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.2 in /eng/dependabot #34964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0] Update IsTargetFrameworkCompatible check #34954
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2253824 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
